get.description: Returns a QR in base64-encoded format to provision the Edge Device.

parameters.name: ntp
parameters.description: NTP server. The maximum number of characters that can be specified is 64.

parameters.name: auto
parameters.description:
QR type.
- Value definition:  
  true: Generates an Enrollment QR for auto enrollment.  
  false: Generates a Service QR for manual enrollment.

parameters.name: wifi_ssid
parameters.description: SSID information to connect the Wi-Fi network.

parameters.name: wifi_pass
parameters.description: Password to connect the Wi-Fi network.

parameters.name: proxy_url
parameters.description: URL of the proxy server.

parameters.name: proxy_port
parameters.description: Port number of the proxy server.

parameters.name: proxy_user_name
parameters.description: Username to access the proxy server.

parameters.name: proxy_pass
parameters.description: Password to access the proxy server.

parameters.name: ip_address
parameters.description: IP address assigned to the device. The maximum number of characters that can be specified is 39.

parameters.name: subnet_mask
parameters.description: Subnet mask applied to the device. The maximum number of characters that can be specified is 39.

parameters.name: gateway
parameters.description: Gateway to connect the device. The maximum number of characters that can be specified is 39.

parameters.name: dns
parameters.description: DNS information of the server. The maximum number of characters that can be specified is 39.

expiration_date.description: The expiration date of QR for auto enrollment.

get.description:
Lists the information of Edge Devices specified by query parameters.  
This API does not retrieve Edge Application properties. To retrieve them, please use the GetDevice API or GetProperty API.

parameters.description:
Number of the items to fetch information. If the parameter (connection_state) is Disconnected, the actual amount of data retrievable will be less than the set limit value.  
Value range: 1 to 1000
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Retrieves additional data beyond the number of targets specified by the query parameter (limit). Specify the value obtained from the response (continuation_token) to fetch the next data.
parameters.name: starting_after

parameters.description:
Connection state.
- Value definition:  
  Connected  
  Disconnected
parameters.name: connection_state

parameters.description: Name of the device. *Fuzzy searching is available.
parameters.name: device_name

parameters.description: Device ID. *Fuzzy searching is available.
parameters.name: device_id

parameters.description: Name of the device group.
parameters.name: device_group_id

parameters.description: To specify multiple device IDs, separate them with commas.
parameters.name: device_ids

parameters.description:
The scope of response parameters to return.
 - Value definition:  
  full: Returns all parameters  
  minimal: Returns minimal parameters *effective for timesaving
parameters.name: scope

continuation_token.description: Last token of extracted data. If there is no continuation data, it will be empty.

  Invalid parameter starting after.

put.description:
Updates the storage hub connector. Specify the items (inference results, images, or both) to transfer to a storage service.
To change the transmission destination of inference results, please modify the value of UploadMethodIR in the Command parameter.
You can store inference results in your cloud storage by setting the value of UploadMethodIR to "BlobStorage".
Likewise, to revert the transmission to AITRIOS internal storage, set the value of UploadMethodIR to "Mqtt".

input_format_param.description:
SAS URL or Presigned URL of the input format param file.
*Usage: Packager conversion information (image format information).  
*The json format is an array of objects. Each object contains the following values.  
 ãƒ»ordinal: Order of DNN input to converter (value range: 0 to 2)  
 ãƒ»format: Format ("RGB" or "BGR")  
*Example:  
 [{  
     "ordinal": 0,  
     "format": "RGB"  
 },  
 {  
     "ordinal": 1,  
     "format": "RGB"  
 }]

network_config.description:
SAS URL or Presigned URL of the network config file.  
*Usage: Conversion parameter information of the model converter. Therefore, it is not necessary to specify when specifying the AI model before conversion.  
*Example:  
 {  
   "Postprocessor": {  
     "params": {  
       "background": false,  
       "scale_factors": [  
         10.0,  
         10.0,  
         5.0,  
         5.0  
       ],  
       "score_thresh": 0.01,  
       "max_size_per_class": 64,  
       "max_total_size": 64,  
       "clip_window": [  
         0,  
         0,  
         1,  
         1  
       ],  
       "iou_threshold": 0.45  
     }  
   }  
 }

frame_rate.description:
The frame rate. *Set an integer value multiplied by 100 for the frame rate that comes up from the sensor. The maximum value of the frame rate depends on the value of DriveMode (see the Drive mode spec of drive_mode parameters for details).
- Value definition:  
  99  
  499  
  999  
  1248  
  1498  
  1998  
  2497  
  2997

drive_mode.description:
The drive mode. - Value definition: 1 2 3 4 - Drive mode spec
Mode Binning Scale Crop Raw Size Max Frame Rate
1 On - - 2028x1520 30(29.97)fps
2 Off On - 2028x1520 20(19.98)fps
3 Off Off On 2028x1520 20(19.98)fps
4 Off Off Off 4056x3040 10(9.99)fps
